topic.title: Exercise: stat002 - Relationship study time - mark

section.p: Of a class of students, everyone has kept the number of study hours that they spent on a particular subject and the grade they obtained for the test.The data can be found in the following overview:
The teacher would like to know if there is a connection between them.

ol.li: Draw in a chart the mark against the study hour.
Calculate the following statistics: number of students, number insufficients (this is with a mark below 5.5), average and standard deviation for time and mark and the correlation coefficient.
